name: Brain Food
description:
Welcome to Brain Food, our submission to the Quarantine Game Jam! Based on the theme "A Lot Of", our game is derived from the many ideas we brainstormed in our initial discussions.

We have a lot of ideas, it's important to catch them before it's too late!

You control the idea system of the brain, responsible for catching as many ideas as possible. Avoid the negative thought zones while collecting ideas!

CONTROLS:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • M to mute the background music
  • N to mute the sounds effects
  • R to restart the level when finished
  • Enter to start the game

TEAM:

Programmer: Dami

Sound Designer / Composer: Jamie Baker

Art: Celeste Chavez

Art: n4rwal
